briefTitle: Octagam 10% Therapy in COVID-19 Patients With Severe Disease Progression
officialTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Octagam 10% Therapy in COVID-19 Patients With Severe Disease Progression
summary: This is a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, multicenter, Phase 3 study to evaluate if high-dose Octagam 10% therapy can stabilize or improve clinical status in patients with severe Coronavirus disease

primaryOutcome.measure: Proportion of Subjects Reaching Stabilization or Improvement in Clinical Status at Day 7
